annotationBean.text: The working directory used by the workflow to store all input, output and intermediate files. Make sure that the user who run the workflow have access to this directory.

the gct fileName to be preprocessed. If fileName does not contain full path, the workflow assumes that it is under /workingDir. Download an example gct from http://www.mcs.anl.gov/~wtan/t2-workflow-repo/caintgrator2/pca_test_gct.gct and save it in your workingDir.

the gct fileName to be preprocessed. If fileName does not contain full path, the workflow assumes that it is under /workingDir. Download an example gct from http://www.mcs.anl.gov/~wtan/t2-workflow-repo/caintgrator2/cms_test.cls and save it in your workingDir.

the gct fileName to be preprocessed. If fileName does not contain full path, the workflow assumes that it is under /workingDir. Download an example gct from http://www.mcs.anl.gov/~wtan/t2-workflow-repo/caintgrator2/cms_test.gct and save it in your workingDir.

the gct fileName to be preprocessed. If fileName does not contain full path, the workflow assumes that it is under /workingDir. Download an example gct from http://www.mcs.anl.gov/~wtan/t2-workflow-repo/caintgrator2/cms_test.cls and save it in your workingDir.
give a name of the result zip file. The result of CMS will then be stored in the workingDir with given file name.

net.sf.taverna.t2.activities.wsdl.xmlspl.wrappedTypeXML: <s:extensions xmlns:s="http://org.embl.ebi.escience/xscufl/0.1alpha"><s:complextype optional="false" unbounded="false" typename="CreateAnalysisResponse" name="parameters" qname="{http://org.genepattern.cagrid.service/ComparativeMarkerSelMAGESvc}CreateAnalysisResponse"><s:elements><s:complextype optional="false" unbounded="false" typename="ComparativeMarkerSelMAGESvcContextReference" name="ComparativeMarkerSelMAGESvcContextReference" qname="{http://org.genepattern.cagrid.service/ComparativeMarkerSelMAGESvc/Context/types}>CreateAnalysisResponse>ComparativeMarkerSelMAGESvcContextReference"><s:elements><s:complextype optional="false" unbounded="false" typename="EndpointReference" name="EndpointReference" qname="{http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/03/addressing}>ComparativeMarkerSelMAGESvcContextReference>EndpointReference"><s:elements><s:basetype optional="false" unbounded="false" typename="anyURI" name="Address" qname="{http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/03/addressing}EndpointReferenceType>Address" /><s:complextype optional="true" unbounded="false" typename="ReferencePropertiesType" name="ReferenceProperties" qname="{http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/03/addressing}EndpointReferenceType>ReferenceProperties"><s:elements><s:basetype optional="false" unbounded="false" typename="any" name="any" qname="any" /></s:elements></s:complextype><s:basetype optional="true" unbounded="false" typename="QName" name="PortType" qname="{http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/03/addressing}EndpointReferenceType>PortType" /><s:basetype optional="true" unbounded="false" typename="NCName" name="ServiceName" qname="{http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/03/addressing}EndpointReferenceType>ServiceName" /><s:basetype optional="false" unbounded="false" typename="any" name="any" qname="any" /></s:elements></s:complextype></s:elements></s:complextype></s:elements></s:complextype></s:extensions>

net.sf.taverna.t2.activities.stringconst.value: <parameterList xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><ns1:ParameterList xmlns:ns1="gme://parameter.asbp/1/org.cabig.icr.asbp.parameter"><parameterCollection xsi:type="ns1:StringParameter" xmlns=""><name>test.direction</name><value>2</value></parameterCollection><parameterCollection xsi:type="ns1:StringParameter" xmlns=""><name>test.statistic</name><value>0</value></parameterCollection><parameterCollection xsi:type="ns1:StringParameter" xmlns=""><name>min.std</name><value>1</value></parameterCollection><parameterCollection xsi:type="ns1:StringParameter" xmlns=""><name>number.of.permutations</name><value>1000</value></parameterCollection><parameterCollection xsi:type="ns1:StringParameter" xmlns=""><name>complete</name><value>false</value></parameterCollection><parameterCollection xsi:type="ns1:StringParameter" xmlns=""><name>balanced</name><value>false</value></parameterCollection><parameterCollection xsi:type="ns1:StringParameter" xmlns=""><name>random.seed</name><value>779948241</value></parameterCollection><parameterCollection xsi:type="ns1:StringParameter" xmlns=""><name>smooth.p.values</name><value>false</value></parameterCollection></ns1:ParameterList></parameterList>

annotationBean.text: do principle component analysis on input .gct file and caGrid transfer plug-in is needed for file transfer. Configuration parameters can be adjusted by changing the string constants.
genePattern data CMS analysis using caGrid transfer

do Comparative Marker Selection analysis on input .gct file and .cls files. caGrid transfer plug-in is needed for file transfer. Configuration parameters can be adjusted by changing the string constants.
Wei Tan University of Chicago and Argonne National Lab http://www.mcs.anl.gov/~wtan/
